name: Don't break the cycle
description:
This is a small game made with Python (using pyxel engine) in slightly less than 03h03 for Trijam #203. There is no sound nor music. You have to move around the circle with other followers without breaking the cycle. Moving too far from the circle or colliding with a fellow follower leads to Game Over. Disclaimer: there is no end to this game and the difficulty doesn't increase with time.

Controls
Move with arrow keys. Restart anytime with R key.
